argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | arwrcl.a | |- A = ( Arrow ` C ) |
| 2 |  | arwdm.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fo1st | |- 1st : _V -onto-> _V |
| 4 |  | #P_fofn | |- ( 1st : _V -onto-> _V -> 1st Fn _V ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- 1st Fn _V |
| 6 |  | #P_fof | |- ( 1st : _V -onto-> _V -> 1st : _V --> _V ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_ax-mp | |- 1st : _V --> _V |
| 8 |  | #P_fnfco | |- ( ( 1st Fn _V /\ 1st : _V --> _V ) -> ( 1st o. 1st ) Fn _V ) |
| 9 | 5, 7, 8 | #P_mp2an | |- ( 1st o. 1st ) Fn _V |
| 10 |  | #P_df-doma | |- domA = ( 1st o. 1st ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fneq1i | |- ( domA Fn _V <-> ( 1st o. 1st ) Fn _V ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_mpbir | |- domA Fn _V |
| 13 |  | #P_ssv | |- A C_ _V |
| 14 |  | #P_fnssres | |- ( ( domA Fn _V /\ A C_ _V ) -> ( domA |` A ) Fn A ) |
| 15 | 12, 13, 14 | #P_mp2an | |- ( domA |` A ) Fn A |
| 16 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( x e. A -> ( ( domA |` A ) ` x ) = ( domA ` x ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 2 | #P_arwdm | |- ( x e. A -> ( domA ` x ) e. B ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( x e. A -> ( ( domA |` A ) ` x ) e. B ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_rgen | |- A. x e. A ( ( domA |` A ) ` x ) e. B |
| 20 |  | #P_ffnfv | |- ( ( domA |` A ) : A --> B <-> ( ( domA |` A ) Fn A /\ A. x e. A ( ( domA |` A ) ` x ) e. B ) ) |
| 21 | 15, 19, 20 | #P_mpbir2an | |- ( domA |` A ) : A --> B |
